Jan 2016 –Dec 2017 Pennine Enviromental Services, Leeds (United Kingdom )  
Industrial refrigeration specialist in food processing
Job Title Projects Manager
Main Duties and •Act as first point of contact with the customer throughout project lifetime.
Responsibilities •Ensure project estimates, schedules and staffing are consistent with project plans. 
•Prepare and review programmes of work.
•Communicate with suppliers about requirements and timescales.
•Monitor project budgets and payment schedules, requesting variation orders if applicable.
• Responsible for ordering, monitor progress and delivery of  the main equipment and parts.
•Liaise with the Design Team, M &E Departments regularly on progress, solving any project issues when necessary.
•Create, monitor and review all documents associated with the projects. 
•Comply with site Health and Safety Standards.
•Ensure that O&M manuals are delivered to the customer and issue handover certificates.
Mar 2010 -Dec 2015 Facultatieve Technologies Ltd, Leeds (United Kingdom ) 
Global market leader in cremation and incineration equipment.
Job Title Project Engineer
Main Duties and •Managing multiple projects from conception through manufacture and installation.
Responsibilities •Responsible for costing, estimating and planning for each project.
•Identifying customer requirements and attending meetings on site.
•Coordinating work for staff and subcontractors ensuring projects are completed on time and on budget.
•Translating customers’ documentation and specifications.
• Negotiating and controlling price of products with suppliers.
•Reviewing specifications and quotations to achieve the best price and quality purchasing.
•Resolving equipment design issues with customers and suppliers.
•Attending internal project reports meetings on a regular basis.
•Establishing and agreeing price variations and final accounts with clients.
•Managing internal and external resources for the scheduled delivery and installation of the equipment.
•Conducting risk assessments and writing method statements to meet H&S requirements.
•Attending commissioning and customers training on site.
•Building strong relationships with clients to maximize the opportunity of future projects.
•Providing assistance to the sales management team to prepare tender documentation .
• Providing prompt support to customers having technical issues by working directly with the Customer Care Service
